data.title: Fit 'em on smallest square-tray possible

testCases.title: Perfect - Test 1
testCases.testOut: 9 will fit PERFECTLY in a square tray with a side-length of 3

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testOut: 16 will fit PERFECTLY in a square tray with a side-length of 4

data.stubGenerator:
read howMany:int
write answer
Statement: Fit them on smallest square-tray possible
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> An integer, {{howMany}} things to fit into the smallest square tray possible
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> String, an assessment, regarding size of smallest square-tray possible and left over spots

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Reverse
Input
Line 1: An integer, howMany things to fit into the smallest square tray possible
Output
Line 1: String, an assessment, regarding size of smallest square-tray possible and left over spots
Constraints
1 < howMany < 10000
Example
Input
9
Output
9 will fit PERFECTLY in a square tray with a side-length of 3
